info.title: XpanseAPI
info.description: RESTful Services to interact with Xpanse runtime.

tags.name: CloudServiceProvider
tags.description: APIs for cloud service provider to manage service templates.

tags.name: AuthManagement
tags.description: APIs for user authentication and authorization.

tags.description: APIs to manage orders of services

put.description:
Manage failed task orders.
Required role: admin or user

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: ID of the workflow task that needs to be handled

parameters.name: retryOrder
parameters.description: Controls if the order must be retried again or simply closed.

put.description:
Complete tasks by task ID and set global process variables .
Required role: admin or user

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: ID of the workflow task that needs to be handled

put.description:

Add user's credential for connecting to the cloud service provider.
Required role: admin or user

delete.description:

put.description:
Start a task to stop the service instance.
Required role: admin or user

get.description:
Get service template using id.
Required role: admin or isv

put.description:
Updates an existing service template using Ocl model. When the request is approved, the updated service template will be published to catalog.
Required role: admin or isv

parameters.name: isUnpublishUntilApproved
parameters.description: If true, the old service template is also removed from catalog until the updated one is reviewed and approved.

delete.description:
Delete service template not in catalog using id.
Required role: admin or isv

put.description:
Remove the service template from catalog.
Required role: admin or isv

Cancel service template request using request id.
Required role: admin or isv

Publishes the same service template to catalog again.
Required role: admin or isv

Updates an existing service template using URL of Ocl file. When the request is approved, the updated service template will be published to catalog.
Required role: admin or isv

parameters.name: isUnpublishUntilApproved
parameters.description: If true, the old service template is also removed from catalog until the updated one is reviewed and approved.

get.description:
Get metrics of a deployed service or a resource.
Required role: admin or user

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: Id of resource in the deployed service

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start UNIX timestamp in milliseconds. If no value filled,the default value is the UNIX timestamp in milliseconds of the five minutes ago.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End UNIX timestamp in milliseconds. If no value filled,the default value is the UNIX timestamp in milliseconds of the current time.

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: Return metrics collected in provided time interval. This depends on how the source systems have generated/collected metrics.

parameters.name: onlyLastKnownMetric
parameters.description: Returns only the last known metric. When this parameter is set then all other query parameters are ignored.

enum: Review Service Template Request Not Allowed
Sensitive Field Encryption Or Decryption Failed Exception
Service State Management Task Not Found
Service Configuration Update Request Not Found

csp.description: The cloud service provider of the credential.

site.description: The site to which the credentials belong to.

variables.description: The variables list of the credential. The list elements must be unique.

timeToLive.description: The time in seconds to live of the credential

name.description: The name of the CredentialVariable,this field is provided by the plugin of cloud service provider.

description.description: The description of the CredentialVariable,this field is provided by the plugin of cloud service provider.

isMandatory.description: If the variable is mandatory. If is optional then the credential completeness check will ignore this variable. It is upto the plugin to decide what needs to be done if this optional credential variable is present.

isSensitive.description: Defines if the particular variable contains sensitive data. For example the value is false for username and true for password variables respectively.

value.description: The value of the CredentialVariable, this field is filled by the user.

CredentialVariable.description: The variables list of the credential. The list elements must be unique.

orderId.description: The id of the service order.

serviceId.description: The id of the deployed service.

customerServiceName.description: Customer's name for the service. Used only for customer's reference. If not provided, the existing customerServiceName from the service will be reused.

serviceRequestProperties.description: The properties for the requested service

enum: Review Service Template Request Not Allowed
Sensitive Field Encryption Or Decryption Failed Exception
Service State Management Task Not Found
Service Configuration Update Request Not Found

serviceId.description: The service id associated with the request.

orderId.description: The order id associated with the request.

configuration.description: The service configuration to be modified

playbookName.description: name of the ansible playbook. Should be the fully qualified file name (including the directory path) in the repo.

virtualEnv.description: Path where the virtualenv must be created.

pythonVersion.description: Version of the python. This version of python must be available in node which is acting as the configManager.

isPrepareAnsibleEnvironment.description: The agent will prepare the virtual environment if this true.Otherwise it is assumed that the environment is already prepared as part of the resource creation or the VM base image build.

requirementsFile.description: the python module requirements file in GIT repo. Should be the fully qualified file name (including the directory path).

galaxyFile.description: Full path of the roles and collections requirements file in GIT repo.

ansibleInventoryRequired.description: Defines if the complete service inventory is necessary for running the ansible job.

deployResourceKind.description: Type of the cloud resource to be reused.

isAllowCreate.description: defines if the required cloud resource can be newly created or should the existing resources must only be used.

AutoFill.description: Variable autofill. Defines if the variable must be one of the existing resources of a specific type.

displayName.description: The display name of availability zone.

varName.description: The variable name of availability zone.

mandatory.description: Indicates if the variable is mandatory.

AvailabilityZoneConfig.description: The list of availability zone configuration of the service.The list elements must be unique.

billingModes.description: Supported billing modes by the managed service. The list elements must be unique.

items.description: Supported billing modes by the managed service. The list elements must be unique.

defaultBillingMode.description: This is used only for display purposes. When provided, this billingMode will be selected in the frontends by default.

Billing.description: The billing policy of the managed service

regions.description: The regions of the Cloud Service Provider. The list elements must be unique.

CloudServiceProvider.description: The cloud service provider of the managed service

name.description: The name of the deploy variable

dataType.description: The type of the deploy variable

example.description: The example value of the deploy variable

description.description: The description of the deploy variable

value.description: The value of the deploy variable. Value can be provided for default variables

mandatory.description: Indicates if the variable is mandatory

valueSchema.description: valueSchema of the variable. The key be any keyword that is part of the JSON schema definition which can be found here https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/meta/validation. Only the type field is taken from dataType parameter directly.

DeployVariable.description: The variables for the deployment, which will be passed to the deployer.The list elements must be unique. All variables are put together to build a JSON 'object' with each variable as a property of this object.

DeployVariableKind.description:
- `fix_env`: Values for variable of this type are defined by the managed service provider 
in the OCL template. Runtime will inject it to deployer as environment variables. 
This variable is not visible to the end user.
- `fix_variable`: Values for variable of this type are defined by the managed service 
provider in the OCL template. Runtime will inject it to deployer as usual variables. 
This variable is not visible to the end user.
- `env`: Value for a variable of this type can be provided by end user. 
If marked as mandatory then end user must provide value to this variable. 
If marked as optional and if end user does not provide it, 
then the fallback value to this variable is read by runtime (it can read from other sources,
 e.g., OS env variables). This variable is injected as an environment 
 variable to the deployer.
- `variable`: Value for a variable of this type can be provided by end user. 
If marked as mandatory then end user must provide value to this variable. 
If marked as optional and if end user does not provide it, 
then the fallback value to this variable is read by runtime (it can read from other sources,
 e.g., OS env variables). This variable is injected as a regular variable to the deployer.
- `env_env`: Value to this variable is read by runtime 
(it can read from other sources, e.g., OS env variables) 
and injected as an environment variable to the deployer. 
End user cannot see or change this variable.
- `env_variable`: Value to this variable is read by runtime 
(it can read from other sources, e.g., OS env variables) 
and injected as a regular variable to the deployer. 
End user cannot see or change this variable.

kind.description: The type of the deployer which will handle the service deployment.

version.description: The version of the deployer which will handle the service deployment.

DeployerTool.description: The deployer tool which will handle the service deployment.

variables.description: The variables for the deployment, which will be passed to the deployer.The list elements must be unique. All variables are put together to build a JSON 'object' with each variable as a property of this object.

credentialType.description: The credential type to do the deployment

serviceAvailabilityConfig.description: The list of availability zone configuration of the service.The list elements must be unique.

additionalProperties.description: Deployment scripts stored in a Map. file name as the key and content as the value. Either scriptFiles or scriptsRepo must be provided.

scriptFiles.description: Deployment scripts stored in a Map. file name as the key and content as the value. Either scriptFiles or scriptsRepo must be provided.

Deployment.description: The deployment of the managed service

serviceFlavors.description: The flavors of the managed service. The list elements must be unique.

isDowngradeAllowed.description: Whether the downgrading is allowed, default value: true.

FlavorsWithPrice.description: The flavors of the managed service

isDataLost.description: Is data lost when service configuration is modified.

isServiceInterrupted.description: Is service availability interrupted when the configuration is interrupted.

name.description: The name of the managed service

serviceVersion.description: The version of the managed service

description.description: The description of the managed service

serviceVendor.description: The serviceVendor of the managed service

icon.description: The icon of the managed service

serviceHostingType.description: Defines which cloud service account is used for deploying cloud resources.

eula.description: End user license agreement content of the service.

Price.description: The price for the defined region and the defined site.

regionName.description: The defined region name. If the special name 'any' provided, this price for all unknown regions.

siteName.description: The defined site name. If the special name 'default' provided, this price for all sites.

PriceWithRegion.description: The listed price list of the flavor of the manged service.

fixedPrices.description: The fixed prices of the flavor in the managed service for regions. The fixed price of the region includes all prices and shown to the customer.

isPriceOnlyForManagementLayer.description: Whether the price is only for management layer. Consumption of the workload resources will be billed additionally..

site.description: The site with the region belongs to, such as default, Chinese Mainland, International,

area.description: The area which the region belongs to, such as Asia, Europe, Africa

Region.description: The regions of the Cloud Service Provider. The list elements must be unique.

count.description: The count of the same resource.

deployResourceKind.description: The kind of the same resource.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the same resource.

properties.description: The properties of the same resource.

Resource.description: The resources of the flavor of the manged service.

resources.description: The resources of the flavor of the manged service.

licensePrices.description: The license prices of the flavor of the manged service.

markUpPrices.description: The listed price list of the flavor of the manged service.

ResourceUsage.description: The resource usage of the flavor in the managed service.

branch.description: Branch to be checked out. Can be branch or a Tag

scriptsPath.description: Directory in the repo where scripts are present. If not provided, the root directory of the repo is considered

ScriptsRepo.description: Deployment scripts hosted on a GIT repo. Either scriptFiles or scriptsRepo must be provided.

type.description: the tool used to manage the service action.

actionManageScripts.description: The collection of the action manage script.

actionParameters.description: The configuration parameters of service .The list elements must be unique. All parameters are put together to build a JSON 'object' with each parameter as a property of this object.

type.description: the tool used to manage the service configuration.

agentVersion.description: the version of the agent that will be used by service resources.

configManageScripts.description: The collection of the configuration manage script.

configurationParameters.description: The collection of service configuration parameters.

name.description: The name of the service config parameter

dataType.description: The type of the service config parameter

example.description: The example value of the service config parameter

description.description: The description of the service config parameter

value.description: The value of the service config parameter. Value can be provided for initial value

initialValue.description: The init value of the service config parameter

valueSchema.description: valueSchema of the variable. The key be any keyword that is part of the JSON schema definition which can be found here https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/meta/validation. Only the type field is taken from dataType parameter directly.

sensitiveScope.description: Sensitive scope of service config parameter storage

isReadOnly.description: Whether the service configuration parameters are read-only

managedBy.description: Service component which manages this configuration parameter.

ServiceChangeParameter.description: The configuration parameters of service .The list elements must be unique. All parameters are put together to build a JSON 'object' with each parameter as a property of this object.

changeHandler.description: should be the name of the resource available in the deployer script.

runOnlyOnce.description: Means should the configuration update run on each node of the specific component or just one.

ServiceChangeScript.description: The collection of the action manage script.

priority.description: The priority of the flavor. The larger value means lower priority.

features.description: Important features and differentiators of the flavor.

items.description: Important features and differentiators of the flavor.

ServiceFlavorWithPrice.description: The flavors of the managed service. The list elements must be unique.

emails.description: List of the email details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

items.description: List of the email details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

phones.description: List of the phone details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

items.description: List of the phone details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

chats.description: List of the chat details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

items.description: List of the chat details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

websites.description: List of the website details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

items.description: List of the website details of the service provider. The list elements must be unique.

ServiceProviderContactDetails.description: The contact details of the service provider.

requestId.description: ID of the request history of the service template.

flavorNames.description: The flavor names to which the policy belongs. If the list is empty, then the policy will be executed for during service deployment of all flavors.

items.description: The flavor names to which the policy belongs. If the list is empty, then the policy will be executed for during service deployment of all flavors.

policy.description: The valid policy belongs to the service.

serviceTemplateId.description: The id of registered service template which the policy belongs to.

flavorNameList.description: The flavor name list which the policy belongs to. If the list is empty, then the policy will be executed for during service deployment of all flavors.

items.description: The flavor name list which the policy belongs to. If the list is empty, then the policy will be executed for during service deployment of all flavors.

csp.description: The csp which the policy belongs to.

policy.description: The valid policy created by the user.

csp.description: The csp which the policy belongs to.

serviceVendor.description: The serviceVendor of the orderable service.

description.description: The description of the orderable service.

icon.description: The icon of the orderable service.

variables.description: The variables for the deployment, which will be passed to the deployer.

serviceHostingType.description: Defines which cloud service account is used for deploying cloud resources.

serviceAvailabilityConfig.description: The list of availability zone configuration of the service.

eula.description: End user license agreement content of the service.

configurationParameters.description: The collection of service configuration parameters.

groupType.description: The type of the group which configuration the deployed resource.

groupName.description: The name of the group which configuration the deployed resource.

resourceId.description: The id of the deployed resource.

resourceName.description: The name of the deployed resource.

resourceKind.description: The kind of the deployed resource.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the deployed resource.

properties.description: The properties of the deployed resource.

orderId.description: The id of the service order.

serviceId.description: The id of the deployed service.

taskType.description: The task type of the service order.

taskStatus.description: The task status of the service order.

originalServiceId.description: The id of the original service.

parentOrderId.description: The id of the parent service order.

userId.description: The id of the user who created the service order.

startedTime.description: The started time of the service order.

completedTime.description: The completed time of the service order.

requestBody.description: The request json of the service order.

previousDeployedResources.description: The deployed resources of the service before this service order.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the deployed service before this service order.

previousDeployedServiceProperties.description: The properties of the deployed service before this service order.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the deployed result before this service order.

previousDeployedResultProperties.description: The properties of the deployed result before this service order.

serviceDeploymentState.description: Current state of the deployment request.

isOrderCompleted.description: Describes if the deployment request is now completed

taskStatus.description: Current task status of the service order.

isOrderCompleted.description: Describes if the service order is now completed.

customerServiceName.description: Customer's name for the service. Used only for customer's reference.If not provided, this value will be auto-generated

billingMode.description: The billing mode of the managed service.

serviceTemplateId.description: The id of the Service Template

userId.description: The id of the user who deployed the service.

serviceDeploymentState.description: The deployment state of the service

serviceState.description: The run state of the service

serviceHostingType.description: Defines which cloud service account is used for deploying cloud resources.

deployResources.description: The resource list of the deployed service.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the deployed service.

deployedServiceProperties.description: The properties of the deployed service.

resultMessage.description: The result message of the deployed service.

customerServiceName.description: Customer's name for the service. Used only for customer's reference.If not provided, this value will be auto-generated

billingMode.description: The billing mode of the managed service.

serviceTemplateId.description: The id of the Service Template

userId.description: The id of the user who deployed the service.

serviceDeploymentState.description: The deployment state of the service

serviceState.description: The run state of the service

serviceHostingType.description: Defines which cloud service account is used for deploying cloud resources.

additionalProperties.description: The properties of the deployed service.

deployedServiceProperties.description: The properties of the deployed service.

changeId.description: ID of the change request created as part of the change order.

resourceName.description: name of the resource on which the change request is executed. Null means any one of the resources that is part of the service and is of type configManager can execute it and until now none of the resource have picked up this request.

configManager.description: type of the resource in the service that must execute the change request.

resultMessage.description: message of change service configuration update request.

properties.description: service configuration requested in the change request.

status.description: status of change service configuration update request.

ServiceChangeDetails.description: Collection of service change details requests generated for the specific change order.

orderStatus.description: Order status of service configuration update result.

configRequest.description: service configuration requested in the change request.

changeRequests.description: Collection of service change details requests generated for the specific change order.

serviceVendor.description: ServiceVendor of the user who registered service template.

regions.description: The regions of the Cloud Service Provider.

description.description: The description of the registered service.

icon.description: The icon of the registered service.

variables.description: The variables for the deployment, which will be passed to the deployer.

serviceHostingType.description: Defines which cloud service account is used for deploying cloud resources.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last updateTime of the registered service.

isReviewInProgress.description: If any request for the service template has a review in-progress.

eula.description: End user license agreement content of the service.

requestId.description: ID of the request history of the service template.

createTime.description: Create time of the service template request.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last update time of the service template request.

billingMode.description: The billing mode of the price.

errorMessage.description: Error reason when price calculation fails.

monitorResourceType.description: The resource type of the metric.

metrics.description: The list of the metric items.

MetricItem.description: The list of the metric items.

healthStatus.description: The health status of backend system.

endpoint.description: The endpoint of backend system. This filed is shown when the user have role 'admin' otherwise it is null.

details.description: The details why health is not ok.This filed is shown when the user have role 'admin' otherwise it is null.

BackendSystemStatus.description: The health status of backend systems. This list contains status of identity provider and status of database.The status of identity provider will return when authorization is enabled.

healthStatus.description: The health status of Xpanse api service.

backendSystemStatuses.description: The health status of backend systems. This list contains status of identity provider and status of database.The status of identity provider will return when authorization is enabled.

requestId.description: ID of the request history of the service template.

createTime.description: Create time of the service template request.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last update time of the service template request.

access_token.description: An access_token as a JWT or opaque token.

expires_in.description: Number of second until the expiration of the access_token

id_token.description: An id_token of the authorized service user
